And <S%G1161><s%> he entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> ships, <S%G4143><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> Simon's, <S%G4613><s%> and prayed <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that he would thrust out <S%G1877><s%> a little <S%G3641><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> land. <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he sat down, <S%G2523><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ship. <S%G4143><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they had this <S%G5124><s%> done, <S%G4160><s%> they enclosed <S%G4788><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of fishes: <S%G2486><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> net <S%G1350><s%> broke. <S%G1284><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they beckoned <S%G2656><s%> unto their partners, <S%G3353><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> ship, <S%G4143><s%> that they should come <S%G2064><s%> and help <S%G4815><s%> them. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> they came, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> filled <S%G4130><s%> both <S%G297><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ships, <S%G4143><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> they <S%G846><s%> began to sink. <S%G1036><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he fell down <S%G4363><s%> at Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> knees, <S%G1119><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Depart <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me; <S%G1700><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> a sinful <S%G268><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> O Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was astonished, <S%G2285><s%> <S%G4023><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> were with <S%G4862><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> draught <S%G61><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> fishes <S%G2486><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had taken: <S%G4815><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> so <S%G3668><s%> was also <S%G2532><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> partners <S%G2844><s%> with Simon. <S%G4613><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not; <S%G3361><s%> from <S%G575><s%> henceforth <S%G3568><s%> thou shalt <S%G2071><s%> catch <S%G2221><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass, <S%G1096><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a certain <S%G3391><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of leprosy: <S%G3014><s%> who <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his face, <S%G4383><s%> and besought <S%G1189><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou wilt, <S%G2309><s%> thou canst <S%G1410><s%> make me clean. <S%G2511><s%> <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> withdrew <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5298><s%> himself into <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayed. <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> a certain <S%G3391><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> teaching, <S%G1321><s%> that <S%G2532><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doctors of the law <S%G3547><s%> sitting by, <S%G2521><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> town <S%G2968><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jerusalem: <S%G2419><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> present to heal <S%G2390><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> he rose up <S%G450><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and took up <S%G142><s%> that whereon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> he lay, <S%G2621><s%> and departed <S%G565><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he left <S%G2641><s%> all, <S%G537><s%> rose up, <S%G450><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
